articles.title: Alvin Ing, pioneering Asian actor in the US, dead at 89 of Covid-19 complications - The Star Online
articles.description: Ing is known for roles on Broadway and on tour in 'Pacific Overtures' and 'Flower Drum Song' as well as in films such as 'The Gambler'.
articles.content:
Actor and singer Alvin Ing, known for roles on Broadway and on tour in Pacific Overtures and Flower Drum Song as well as in films such as The Gambler, has died. He was 89.
Ing died Saturday at Provi… [+1783 chars]

articles.title: Un-un-un-un-unbelievable: Chen Tianwen, 58, goes viral on TikTok with this scary stunt - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Veteran actor Chen Tianwen's latest clip on TikTok has gone viral, with more than 191,000 views within a day of posting. The behind-the-scenes footage showed the 58-year-old actor on the set of 2019 drama The Good Fight, doing his own stunt. A bla…
